fullplot: A young, married motel receptionist in a small town sells her body to motel guests, but not just for money. This dangerous other life leads her to a male version of herself, who takes her to the extreme edge, the same place her mother had been before but did not survive.
plot: A young married woman (Parker) sells her body, not just for money, to guests at the motel where she works as a receptionist.
title: Suspicious River
